about_the_game:
This DLC pack includes the following costumes:
  • Outfits
    Asuka's Sakura Swimsuit, Homura's Sakura Swimsuit, Yumi's Sakura Swimsuit, Miyabi's Sakura Swimsuit, Renka's Sakura Swimsuit
  • Hairstyles
    Asuka's Sakura Hair, Homura's Sakura Hair, Yumi's Sakura Hair, Miyabi's Sakura Hair, Renka's Sakura Hair
  • Accessories
    Sakura Hairclip, Sakura Kodachi, Asuka's Sakura Scarf, Sakura Sunglasses, Sakura Earrings
detailed_description:
